sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"controls"}}>{`Controls`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Create`}</MDXTag>{` - Press and hold `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`spacebar`}</MDXTag>{` and choose `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`category`}</MDXTag>{` » `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`node`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`Left Mouse Button click`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Pan`}</MDXTag>{` - Press and hold `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`Left Mouse Button`}</MDXTag>{` and move mouse`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Move`}</MDXTag>{` - Press and hold `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`Left Mouse Button`}</MDXTag>{` on node`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Rename`}</MDXTag>{` - To rename node simply start typing when one node is selected`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Connect`}</MDXTag>{` - Click and hold desired node output and move it to other node's output then release mouse button
IMPORTANT: Every node is connectable only if it creates a valid schema. Experiment to test it.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Node Properties`}</MDXTag>{` - Click right mouse button on node`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`⌘/Ctrl + `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`Left Mouse Button click`}</MDXTag>{` - select multiple nodes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li">{`Delete`}</MDXTag>{` - Click `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`delete`}</MDXTag>{` button when node/nodes are selected or right click » `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`delete`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
